data.text: @schrottgedanken Hallo! Vielen Dank für Ihr positives Feedback. Bitte zögern Sie nich mit uns Kontakt aufzunehmen, falls Sie weitere Unterstützung benötigen. MfG, Bozhana
@Haoqi58032583 Hi, at least in July. The timetables for the upcoming months has not yet been confirmed. //Mari

@EricStam In 2019, we flew three flights from SFO to HEL with biofuel, supported by our customers’ biofuel purchases. We intend to increase the share of biofuel purchases in the future, as sustainable aviation fuels are a key part of our sustainability strategy. Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text: @vickiwang921 Hi, if your flight is about to depart within few days, please contact us via chat at https://t.co/FE22wx9zBM or give us a call. All changes must be completed before current departure. //Katja

@SnowyDave Hi, 

Could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking.

So we can check your booking details and refund status.

-Erkki

data.text: In our Airbus and Embraer aircraft, the air in the cabin is fresh air drawn from outside. That air gets sterilized by high temperatures in the pneumatic and air conditioning systems. The rest of the air is circulated through extremely efficient HEPA filters. #COVID19 #safety https://t.co/sA94VLx1SQ
@ChuliweiLewis Hello! Unfortunately schedules have not yet been confirmed to August. We will inform these later//Hanna-Mari

@ohfuckhellno Hi, I'm afraid taping the longboard to your suitcase can't be recommended nor can we promise in any way that airport will accept such combination. Safest way is to carry it as separate checked-in luggage with own luggage tag number. //Katja

@CanMass Hi, 

Could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking. 

So we can check your booking details and refund status.

-Erkki
@jonronan Hi John! According to this moment´s information first flights to Bangkok are available 1st of September.//Hanna-Mari

@iamsunilkr11 Hi,

Thanks for your message.

Currently we don't have flights to/from India.

You can check more information from our website:
https://t.co/jXuAm2jFFk

-Erkki

@realwilliamran Hi, 

Could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking.

We have delays in the refund processing. Our average handling time is approximately 11-13 weeks.

-Erkki

data.text: RT @Anne_Larilahti: The most direct (and hence the most energy efficient) route between Europe and Asia - one of the cornerstones of Finnai…
RT @paivyttallqvist: Ni hao, Shanghai! We are happy to re-open our PVG route this week! ✈️ https://t.co/1xSvRtA4m1
RT @TopiManner: Gradual opening continues. After suspending flights to China in the beginning of February and only operating cargo-only fli…

Finnair has received permission from Chinese authorities to begin operating one weekly flight as of 23 July between Helsinki and Shanghai with its Airbus A350 aircraft. Read more: https://t.co/pSmx47RaDp https://t.co/kMsEfCEQAD

@RDW27 Hi,

data.text: RT @jusatuo: I was proud to be onboard! This is the landing of the particular flight to @HelsinkiAirport rwy 15: https://t.co/LBLQX8dD9Z ht…

Exactly nine years ago, we flew our first ever biofuel flight! ✈️The route was Amsterdam-Helsinki, and it was operated with an Airbus A319 aircraft. We have set a target that we will cut our net emissions by 50% by the end of 2025. Biofuels play one part in achieving that target. https://t.co/VINv3ZcYnk

@Karl_Marshall0 Hi, sorry to hear that and unfortunately we do have longer queues at the moment. We could have a look at your refund application, but first please send us a DM with your booking and contact details. //Mari

@Jackobli Hallo Herr Müller, Vielen Dank für die Rückmeldung. Leider kann ich den Inhalt der angehängten Dokumente nicht sehen. Eine Buchungsreferenz oder Ticketnummer würde auch helfen. Mit freundlichen Grüßen D.Teodossieva

@Jackobli Hallo Müller, Vielen Dank für die Rückmeldung. Leider kann ich den Inhalt der angehängten Dokumente nicht sehen. Eine Buchungsreferenz oder Ticketnummer würde auch helfen. Mit freundlichen Grüßen D.Teodossieva

@igwigg Hallo Herr Jacobli, 
Vielen Dank für die Rückmeldung. 
Ihre Buchung ist in der Tat direkt bei Finnair gemacht. Ich werde ein Vermerk in den Antrag setzen, dass es möglichst mit Priorität bearbeitet wird. 
Mit freundlichen Grüßen D.Teodossieva
@BowenLi_a Hi, I've just replied your DM. //Katja

@Jackobli Hallo Herr Jacobli,
Noch einmal Danke für Ihren Kommentar. Ist Ihre Buchung direkt bei Finnair oder über einen Drittanbieter gemacht worden. Könnten Sie uns eine Buchungsreferenz mitteilen? Wir könnten ggf. sofort überprüfen.  Mit freundlichen Grüßen, D.Teodossieva

@igwigg Hallo Herr Jacobli,
Vielen Dank für Ihren Kommentar.
Ist Ihre Buchung direkt bei Finnair oder über einen Drittanbieter gemacht worden. Könnten Sie uns eine Buchungsreferenz oder Ticketnummer mitteilen?
Mit freundlichen Grüßen
D.Teodossieva

@juhanaojala Hei,

Matkustamohenkilökuntamme käyttää kirurgisia maskeja koko lennon ajan, ja myös matkustajien tulee käyttää suojainta koneeseen noustessa ja lennon aikana. Maskin voi ottaa pois syömisen ja juomisen ajaksi.

 Alle 7-v lasten ei tarvitse käyttää suojainta.

-Erkki

@jylkka Hei Tuomo, meillä on vakaa kassa ja käsittelyiden hitaus johtuu siitä, että olemme saaneet lyhyessä ajassa kolmen vuoden edestä takaisinmaksuhakemuksia. Olemme lisänneet resursseja hakemusten käsittelyyn. He tekevät parhaansa, jotta kaikki asiakkaat saavat rahansa takaisin pian.

data.text: @ConstantNewb Hi Lee! Yes, if your ticket type allows change of route and you can travel to Finland. According to travel restrictions boarders are not open for UK citizens at the moment. // Helmi
@Lujie77869874 Hi! Unfortunately we are still waiting approval from China government. // Helmi

@Hamis_Sami Hei Sami! Pahoittelut kun olet joutunut odottelemaan takaisinmaksua. Käsittelyaikaan vaikuttaa moni asia, kuten maksutapa, onko varausta jo kertaalleen muutettu, kuinka monta lippua/lisäpalvelua varauksella on yms. Käsittelemme hakemuksesi kuitenkin mahdollisimman pian. // Helmi
@LeFuzzyOtter Hi Ann! At the moment there's no entry to Finland as citizen of UK. // Helmi

@DeRebordechan Hi Greta! When you've booked your tickets from Finnair channels, it may take up to 3 months to handle refund case. But because you've booked yours from travel agency, they will handle your refund and we can't say how long that's going to take. // Helmi

@syppeng We hope to resume our operations between Helsinki and Shanghai on 1st September, but that is still pending for authorization from Chinese government. Tickets can be bought and schedule can be seen on our website. /Elli

@amjiihoo Ikävä kuulla. Jos voisimme näin Twitterin välityksellä olla avuksi, lähetäthän lisää tietoja matkavarauksestasi (Varaustunnus, sähköpostiosoitteesi ja puhelinnumerosi) yksityisviestillä (DM). -Niki
@jakehallam01 Hi Jake! I'll get back to your DM, shortly. -Niki

data.text: RT @MikkoTainio: 600+ cargo flights since April. Supporting many European societies with COVID-19 related deliveries, also keeping the shak…
@KordianLangner Hello! Flights are already available for the Christmas time and usually these holiday seasons are quite popular. It is advisable to book early//Hanna-Mari
@aemiettinen Hi Asko, thanks for sharing your feedback. We take the safety measures seriously and I will forward your feedback to the right team. /Krista from Finnair
